official_title: Liver Cancer Disparities in American Indian and Alaska Native Persons
inclusion_criteria:
* Cirrhosis, any etiology, or chronic HBV infection
* High risk of HCC
* Age 18-75
* Competent to provide informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Prior diagnosis of HCC
* Current suspicion of HCC
* Prior receipt of any organ transplantation
* Participation in another HCC screening trial
* CTP score >=10
* MELD-Na score >20
* GFR<30
* Poor life expectancy (<5 years)
* Contraindication to MRI
* Inability to complete study visits
* Currently pregnant
